description: This file defines an API route for processing city data submissions via FastAPI. It includes routing configuration, request validation, dependency injection for backend communication, and error handling.

methods.name: CityResponse submit_city( payload: CityRequest, source: Optional[str] = None, backend: BackendClient = Depends(get_backend_client), )
methods.description: Handles POST requests to submit a city, validates input, interacts with backend, and manages errors.

ctags.name: submit_city
ctags.signature: ( payload: CityRequest, source: Optional[str] = None, backend: BackendClient = Depends(get_backend_client), )
